newsitem.title: USA: Plastic Containers sells $125 mln in junk bonds.
newsitem.headline: Plastic Containers sells $125 mln in junk bonds.

text.p: The following 144a private placement offering from Plastic Containers Inc was priced on Wednesday, according to lead underwriter, Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette.
TYPE SR SUB NOTES ISS PRICE 100 FIRST PAY DATE 6/15/97
LAST MOODY'S B1 YIELD 10 PCT PAY FREQ SEMI-ANNUAL
LAST S&P B-PLUS SPREAD 368 BPS CALLABLE NON-CALL FIVE
